The Pocket Edition was released to rave reviews. Now gamers from all over the world can enjoy the best things about their favorite game right on their Android device. Travel through randomly generated worlds as you craft and create items and buildings to ensure your survival. Along the way, you’ll encounter a wide variety of enemies and creatures to contend with. Do it alone or bring some friends to take your game to the next level. Stop playing old versions and jump into the now with Minecraft: Pocket Edition on Mac or PC with BlueStacks 4.

The world of Minecraft: Pocket Edition is an ever-expanding universe of blocks and textures. This sprawling world seems too big to explore on a tiny mobile device. Unlock the true dimension of this new Minecraft adventure by playing Minecraft: Pocket Edition on PC or Mac. Watch the video above, which gives you information about BlueStacks 4 and how you can experience this game for yourself for free. Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on great adventures. Blocks are found by mining and looting the randomly generated worlds. Use these blocks to craft items like weapons and clothing, or to construct awesome buildings for security. Regular updates add new content and features like block colors, block textures, and even holiday-themed content. Expand your Minecraft universe at any time by simply switching between phones and computers.
